page.title: 16FORESTRY
page.content: There are three sections of wood in our survey map. They are : 1.Wood behind Roadmans house planted in 1968. 2.Wood behind Glentairie Lodge planted in 1962. 3.Balnaboth Craig planted in 1960-1965. Each wood is a mixture of three different types of trees.There is the {Norway Spruce (Christmas tree).}When it is fully grown it could reach the height of one hundred and fifty feet. The{Larch}which is the only conifer tree that looses its needles in winter.Its new needles, in spring, grow upwards in soft bright emerald green clusters. The{Scots Pine}is a native tree to Scotland.Its needles are bluish-green. The cones are harder, smaller and rounder than the Spruce cones.
